page.title: 15TRADE AND LIFESTYLES
page.content: Prices for groceries are high in the two shops in{Higham-on-the-Hill.}The Newsagent is a General Store and an Off-Licence for alcoholic drinks.The other store houses the{Sub-Post Office Shoes,clothes and furnishings buying make it necessary to visit Hinckley or Nuneaton.Football Pools are collected at one of the shops,and a Tote is held at a local Public House to help provide a Christmas Bonus for Senior Citizens and an outing for the children. The{Newsagent}supplies all the national newspapers,and local papers are sold by both shops.Three free trading papers are delivered in the village.A{village magazine}'Outlook' is issued monthly-a self-supporting publication produced by volunteers. A{church magazine}is published quarterly.
